TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The CPU strain is so much you fry all of the cores on your CPU.

I wish for my very own Avro Lancaster

Granted, but it is the size of the sun.

I wish I had my stuff back in Minecraft 

Edited June 12, 2021 by Admiral Fluffy

Granted. After months of hard grind you finally get all your stuff back then suddenly hear the sound of a fuse lighting behind you.

I wish for more *.mu model files of Gerry Anderson craft.

Granted. Do you feel the marionette ropes attached to your hands and shoulders?

I wish Jupiter was flat. Too.

Granted. You watch a car run over your Jupiter bar and flatten it. (They do still exist somewhere right?)

I wish this thread to make page 669.

Granted, it’s not by me though.

I wish for a H O T A S for WT.

Granted. Your ass gets hot while watching television. (I know HOTAS, don't know what WT is)

I wish for horses that beggars can ride.

granted, but the horse is dead

i wish for a car that could drive automatically

Granted, but it runs out of battery almost instantly.

I wish I could have some more cookies

Granted. You get a car without the driver's wheel.

I want for a BostonDynamics robohorse.

Granted. But it is installed with new AI with no preprogrammed compassion or empathy towards humans and it straps 50 kilos to your back and makes you move on all fours.

 

I wish for a neverending song.

Granted, you get your least favorite song playing constantly in your head for the rest of your life.

[snip]

Granted. [snip]

 

Actually, now that I think about it, I wish everyone would hurry and read it so that thread will be unlocked.

Granted, the moderator's post becomes 2 kilometers long and you are a slow reader.

I wish for a 205 liter drum full of Lego pieces.

Granted. They're 1x1 studs.

I wish for a baked potato.

it's a baked sweet potato

I wish for nothing

Granted. You don't get it.

Baked sweet potatoes are tasty. I wish for a baked sweet potato.

Granted, you get a baked normal potato with sugar. 
I wish this darn traffic would let up so I can get to wallops faster

Granted. The traffic has thinned out but because of impending Godzilla attack and he destroys the Wallops.

 

Wish the work day would end already.

Granted, an accident involving a Kerbal, an excavator, a pile of dirt, and a steep gradient caused the work day to end.

I wish I hadn't taken apart my Lego forklift.

Granted. Your Lego forklift was never put together.

I wish for a baked Russet potato without sugar.

Granted. To bake it, we threw it into the sun.

I wish that Lego made small "down and out" crane outrigger pieces.

Granted, but they are 500,000 dollars a piece.

I wish my room was clean

Sure, everything was thrown in a log chipper and carried away by a Liebherr TA 230 articulated dump truck even though they are not available in the USA yet and are not street legal.

I wish for money.

Granted. Money is the root of all evil, though.

I wish for a Russet potato without added sugar baked in a normal oven.
